Publish

Packaged apps are published in the same way as other types of apps in the Chrome Web Store. For detailed instructions, see Publishing Your App.

Note regarding visibility of packaged apps:

  • Only users with Chrome 28 or later can see packaged apps in the Chrome Web Store. Chrome 28 is currently in the beta channel, but it will be pushed to the stable channel and be available to all users soon.
  • Developers can share direct links to packaged apps with all users.
